2020-03-05: CREATE TABLE `EsdevenimentsPeriodes` (`id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`esdeveniment` INT NULL COMMENT 'Taula dels periodes de un sol esdeveniment',`salas` LONGTEXT NULL,`allotjament` LONGTEXT NULL,`restauracio` LONGTEXT NULL,`activitats` LONGTEXT NULL,`horaris` LONGTEXT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`));

CREATE TABLE `Esdeveniments` (`id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`id_client` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,`nom` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL,`referencia` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL,`meta` longtext,`estat` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=big5;
2020-03-06: ALTER TABLE `Esdeveniments` ADD COLUMN `start` DATETIME NULL AFTER `estat`,ADD COLUMN `end` DATETIME NULL AFTER `start`,ADD COLUMN `assistents` INT NULL AFTER `end`,ADD COLUMN `tipologia` VARCHAR(45) NULL AFTER `assistents`,ADD COLUMN `establiments` LONGTEXT NULL AFTER `tipologia`,ADD COLUMN `flexible` INT NULL AFTER `establiments`;
